title: Intelligent Web-Based Personalized Science Learning Path Design Process

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Elementary School Science Core Concepts
context.additional_context: Science Instruction Competency Enhancement Program for In-Service Elementary Teachers and Educational Practitioners. Implemented in Real-Time Online Environments with Digital Devices, Offering Personalized Learning Experiences Tailored to Individual Capabilities and Preferences

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized learning pathways matching their science knowledge level using an intelligent web platform.
Learners can understand interconnections between science concepts and establish utilization strategies via an ontology-based knowledge management system.
Learners can select optimal instructional approaches (visual/auditory/experimental, etc.) using the Learner Intelligent Advisor (LIA) module.

resources: Digital Content Library for Science Education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
